title: Airbnb goes upscale to breathe new life into business
text:
Airbnb goes upscale to breathe new life into business 2:19pm EST - 01:59 
Airbnb is rolling out new services aimed at attracting travelers looking for luxury accommodations and traditional hotels, the latest move to contend with sputtering growth in its original home-renting business. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
